article_title: Jimmy Fallon Jokes About Lindsey Graham's Gender in Paycheck Fairness Act Bit
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER





During his opening monologue on NBC’s Friday broadcast of “The Tonight Show,” host Jimmy Fallon took aim at Senate Republicans that blocked the so-called Paycheck Fairness Act, a measure that would supposedly prevent wage discrimination against women.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Fallon proposed what some Republican senators would earn if they were women, showing female doppelgangers of each respective Republican senator. But for Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC), they were the same…

Follow Jeff on Twitter @jeff_poor
